title: Request Unofficial Transcript
description: A student needs a copy of their unofficial transcript to review their grades.

tasks.description: Guide the student to the location in the student portal where they can view and print their own unofficial transcript.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for self-service.

tasks.description: Confirm the student is able to access the document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Student confirms they have successfully downloaded their transcript.
